actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A joint resolution to amend the Export Administration Act of 1979 to prohibit all exports of grain or soybeans to the Soviet Union until the Soviet Union ceases its religious persecution of Christians, Jews, and other religious groups.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Amends the Export Administration Act of 1979 to prohibit the exportation of grain or soybeans to the Soviet Union until the President reports to Congress that the Soviet Union has ceased its religious persecution and allows members of religious groups to emigrate to the nation of their choice.

titles.title: A joint resolution to amend the Export Administration Act of 1979 to prohibit all exports of grain or soybeans to the Soviet Union until the Soviet Union ceases its religious persecution of Christians, Jews, and other religious groups.
